question1.qns: Which of the following nouns is uncountable?

question3.qns: We cannot see the sun on a _________ day.

question4.qns: Complete the sentence: Let’s get _______ the train before it leaves.

question5.qns: Which of the following does not belong in the group?

question6.qns: Is there a bird in the tree? No, there _______.

question7.qns: The young of a cow is called a _______.

question8.qns: _______ that boy standing on the chair?

question9.qns: The man fell into the river _______ a great splash.

question10.qns: We assembled in the multi-purpose hall to watch the _________ of musicians perform.

question11.qns: A butterfly has to push _______ way out of the cocoon by itself.

question12.qns: My brother can swim as fast as _______.

question13.qns: I like _______ as I am good in calculation.

question14.qns: The lion _______ in wait for its prey to walk by.

question16.qns: The elephant swam bravely _______ the river currents to save her calf.

question17.qns: Susan is the _______ of the twins.

question18.qns: _______ he is skinny, he is a very good weightlifter.
question18.choices: Although|As a result of|In spite of|Otherwise

question19.qns: The jury _______ declared the murderer guilty.

question20.qns: The marooned sailor was excited when he finally saw a ship on _______ horizon.
